subject: Officiating (Sports)
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Yuichi Nishimura, 42, of Japan, will be the referee for the World Cup’s opening match on Thursday night, when Brazil plays Croatia in São Paolo.
snippet: Yuichi Nishimura, 42, of Japan, will be the referee for the World Cup’s opening match on Thursday night, when Brazil plays Croatia in São Paolo.
